FuncDef: This command assigns an existing bandwidth policer as an action on flows matching this AQP entry. The match criteria for the AQP entry must specify a uni-directional traffic direction before a policer action can be configured. If a policer is used in one direction in an AQP match entry the same policer name cannot be used by another AQP entry which uses a different traffic direction match criteria.

ParaDef.Info: The name of the existing flow setup rate policer for this application assurance profile. The policer-name is configured in the config>app-assure>group>policer context.
